name: gpm_precipitation_v07b_monthly
title: Monthly IMERG (GPM) precipitation (v07B)
description: Monthly IMERG GPM (v07B) precipitation - research version
details: Created by extracting monthly IMERG V07B GPM data

extract_types_info.max: maximum precipitation value per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.mean: average precipitation value per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.min: minimum precipitation value per unit of analysis

extras.citation: G. Huffman, D. Bolvin, D. Braithwaite, K. Hsu, R. Joyce, P. Xie, 2014: Integrated Multi-satellitE Retrievals for GPM (IMERG), V07B. NASA's Precipitation Processing Center, accessed 27 June, 2024, arthurhouftps.pps.eosdis.nasa.gov
